usa: A revolt led by Nat Turner occurs.
australia: Administration of King George Sound passes to Swan River Colony, convicts returned to New South Wales.<sup id="cite_ref-srnsw_1-1" class="reference">[1]</sup>
The Sydney Herald (later to become The Sydney Morning Herald) was first published.
argentina: Pacto Federal signed between provinces to protect federal nature of country
The Voyage of the Beagle with Charles Darwin and Robert FitzRoy visited the Río de la Plata, Patagonia and Tierra del Fuego (to 1834)
Argentine Governor of the Falkland Islands Luis Vernet is expelled by USS Lexington following his seizure of United States interests. New governor murdered in 1832 mutiny
